net.fognode.request.simple

Class SimpleRequest

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.fognode.request.simple.SimpleRequest
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Request

    public class SimpleRequest
extends java.lang.Object
implements Request
    HTTP Request implementation. For increased security (but decreased performance), create a new Request implementation using defensive deep copies inside the constructor and payload getter.
    Author:
    Ludwig Muench

        Constructor. For increased security, create a new implementation populating the payload attribute with a defensive deep copy of the payload argument.
